name: Mining and extraction
description: Within Manufacturing and processing, this field is the study of assessing, planning, developing, and directing the extraction of minerals, oil, and gas from the earth.

name: Coal mining
description: The process of extracting coal from the ground, a major sector within Mining and extraction.

name: Mineral technology
description: The study of technologies and processes used in the extraction and processing of minerals, part of Mining and extraction.

name: Mining of minerals
description: The general activity of extracting valuable minerals or other geological materials from the Earth, the core of Mining and extraction.

name: Oil and gas drilling
description: The process of drilling wells to explore for and extract petroleum oil and natural gas, a key operation in Mining and extraction.

name: Oil and gas extraction
description: The processes involved in bringing oil and natural gas to the surface after drilling, a major component of Mining and extraction.

name: Raw material extraction
description: The general study and practice of obtaining raw materials (like minerals, oil, gas) from natural sources, central to Mining and extraction.
